mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users_status (userId, statusMessage, privacyStatusType, locationId, isPinned, createTime, updateTime) VALUES (#{user.userId:INTEGER}, #{statusMessage:VARCHAR}, #{privacyStatusType:VARCHAR}, #{location.locationId:INTEGER}, #{isPinned:BOOLEAN}, SYSDATE(), SYSDATE())
mapper.update: UPDATE users_status SET statusMessage= #{statusMessage:VARCHAR}, privacyStatusType= #{privacyStatusType:VARCHAR}, locationId= #{location.locationId:INTEGER}, isPinned= #{isPinned:BOOLEAN}, updateTime= SYSDATE() WHERE userStatusId = #{userStatusId:INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT us.userStatusId, us.statusMessage, us.privacyStatusType, us.isPinned, us.createTime, us.updateTime , u.userId, u.name, lo.locationId, lo.location
FROM users_status us INNER JOIN user u ON u.userId = us.userId LEFT JOIN location lo ON lo.locationId = us.locationId WHERE 1 = 1 AND us.privacyStatusType = 'PUBLIC'
AND us.userId = #{userId} AND us.userStatusId = #{userStatusId} ORDER BY us.updateTime DESC
